data.text: @tweettruth2me @nevadadot Nice. There shouldn’t be any exemptions besides allergies. Religious exemptions are bs. :)

@nevadadot @tweettruth2me Cases are down 94.9% in your state and current deaths are 5 per day—not much more than the motor vehicle deaths. Perhaps, you should stay in your lane and focus on reducing vehicle deaths after having the highest amount in 15 years. Removing valuable employees is not the answer. https://t.co/vjy7E8oiwo

@tweettruth2me @nevadadot Yup and they force you to take the unwanted test WITHOUT PAY!  Work instruction given without pay against Nevada Revised Statute 608.0195 and 608.215.  But dictator @GovSisolak goes unchecked once again. HR won’t do anything about it

@tweettruth2me Per State of NV policy, all unvaccinated state employees are required to submit to weekly COVID testing or face a progressive disciplinary process. If an employee does not believe they received a response to their request for religious exemption to testing, they may contact HR.
@tweettruth2me @nevadadot That's insane. I actually offer 💉declination forms and I've had a 99% success rate so far! https://t.co/mP24Qdf25z https://t.co/e42AxFLIje
@tweettruth2me @nevadadot I can’t believe this is still happening. Not in southern florida
@tweettruth2me @JCDeardeuff @nevadadot Biden is keeping the emergency act in place. You know it’s to drive mail in ballots through election
